chat.title: AI Analysis Assistant
chat.welcome: Welcome! I can help you analyze your attendance data. Upload a CSV file and select a category to get started, or ask me questions about your data.

analysepast.title: Analyse Past Roll Call Data
analysepast.description: Upload multiple CSV files from past roll calls to analyze attendance patterns and trends using AI.
analysepast.dragDropMultiple: or drag and drop multiple files
